description: Surely we have all encountered small troubles in everyday life, from clothes pockets being overloaded with many items to keys, headphones, and phones being lost. lost in the backpacks and bags that we put into them haphazardly. But then we gradually consider it a habit and live with these small problems...

about.story-meaning: With the message More than Simplicity, Camelia devotes all its heart to making its products. Not only is the simplicity of the exterior design helping users save time thinking about choosing suitable clothes, and the internal design of each product is carefully and streamlined to create convenience and order for the user.

address1: 235 Nguyen Thi Dinh, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City
address2: 71 Tran Quang Dieu, District 3, Ho Chi Minh City
description1: From the very special favors you have given Camelia in recent times when many customers have owned many products, supported and loved Camelia Brand. We truly appreciate that.
description2: The customer loyalty program was born, with the goal of improving customer experience and giving more gratitude to customers who have been with Camelia Brand since the first days.
welcome: Have good days puts heart and soul into each product, bringing people simplicity from the smallest things
seo: You'll love the Havegooddays Club. Become a member to earn points, redeem them for free drinks and pastries, and receive special offers.
VAT: VAT will be added at confirmation of purchase.
